section.20: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Ata said:"I was told that Umm Habibah bin Abi Sufyan said: "I heard the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) say: 'Whoever prays twelve rak'ahs during the day and night, apart from the prescribed prayers, Allah (SWT) will build for him a house in Paradise
